alert.note: Alert for Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gunnison County through 230 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Gunnison, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Gunnison County. This includes Colorado 135 between mile markers 12 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
